job.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer (.NET)
job.description: <p><strong>Own and build solutions for eCommerce applications</strong></p><p><br></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build complex solutions from the ground up using the latest web technologies</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Develop new user-facing features using cutting-edge technologies</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Collaborate with a diverse team of designers, developers, and engineers</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Implement web design principles and standards to ensure our sites renders well across multiple devices&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Working in a dynamic, agile, team environment developing awesome new frontend applications&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Innovating new ideas to evolve our applications and processes&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lead/contribute to engineering efforts from design to implementation, solving complex technical challenges around developer and engineering productivity and velocity</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build and ensure our code artifacts are building in Continuous Integration (CI) fashion and we soon realize our dream of Continuous Delivery (CD)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>&nbsp;What you bring to the role:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or Relevant Science and Math disciplines with an IT emphasis is required</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10+ years’ of relevant technical experience, with at least 5 years building Front End Solutions in eCommerce, or Master’s degree plus 6+ years of relevant experience</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Deep hands-on experience with Front-end technologies JSON, HTML, CSS and CSS pre-processing frameworks (Sass, Less or Stylus), JavaScript, JavaScript libraries (Jquery) or Web Components and other industry standard frameworks</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hands-on experience in developing frontend solutions</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;High proficiency in React, JQuery, Angular 2 JS, Bootstrap, and Knockout JS</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Deep, hands-on experience with .NET Web development experience with C# /.NET4.x / MVC.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong background in MS SQL Server, SQL Databases, and writing SQL stored procedures</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Understanding of layout aesthetics</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Extensive experience with front end frameworks such as ASP.Net MVC, React, Angular, Vue, or Ember</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good understanding of asynchronous request handling (AJAX)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with RESTful APIs and MicroServices</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with unit testing libraries such as Mocha, Jest, Chai, Enzyme</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with code versioning tools (TFS, git) and process</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Knowledge of SEO principles</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong interpersonal skills&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong ability to collaborate and work across teams and disciplines&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong software design and test methodology knowledge and abilities&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, both verbally and in written forms&nbsp;</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to understand and analyze complex problems and break them into small solvable pieces</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to learn new tools, frameworks, technologies and platforms required experience&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
